description: Planetary meanings and interpretations for Vedic astrology - Houses, Signs, Aspects, Dignities

houses.1: Strong personality, leadership qualities, good health, confident, may be egoistic, father's influence on life, government connections possible
houses.2: Good wealth from father or government, strong family values, harsh speech sometimes, income through leadership roles, eye problems possible
houses.3: Courage, self-made success, strained relations with siblings, short travels for work, government contracts, writing abilities
houses.4: Property through father, vehicle ownership, peaceful home life, mother's health concerns, real estate gains, education in prestigious institutions
houses.5: Intelligent children (especially sons), creative abilities, speculative gains, past life merit, spiritual inclination, good education
houses.6: Victory over enemies, health issues, conflicts with authority, digestive problems, success in competitive fields, medical profession
houses.7: Strong partner, government job for spouse, business partnerships with authorities, delayed marriage, partner may be egoistic
houses.8: Long life, inheritance from father, interest in occult, chronic health issues, transformative experiences, government pension benefits
houses.9: Highly fortunate, righteous, religious father, foreign travels, higher education, blessings of teachers, spiritual wisdom
houses.10: Excellent career, government position, fame, authority in profession, father's blessings, leadership roles, public recognition
houses.11: Fulfillment of desires, income from government, influential friends, elder siblings successful, gains through father, social recognition
houses.12: Expenses on father, foreign residence, spiritual seeking, eye problems, government abroad, meditation, isolation periods, hospitals

aspect_meanings.conjunction: Planets merge energies, strongest influence, combined effects
aspect_meanings.opposition: Planets oppose, creates tension, balance needed, full awareness
aspect_meanings.trine: Harmonious flow, easy manifestation, natural talents, support
aspect_meanings.square: Tension, obstacles, growth through challenge, action required
aspect_meanings.sextile: Opportunity, cooperation, potential to develop, conscious effort

dignity_effects.exalted: Planet at maximum strength, optimal functioning, excellent results, natural expression
dignity_effects.own_sign: Planet comfortable, good strength, positive results, authentic expression
dignity_effects.mooltrikona: Planet very strong, consistent results, favorable outcomes, reliable
dignity_effects.friendly_sign: Planet supported, moderate strength, helpful results, cooperative
dignity_effects.neutral_sign: Planet balanced, variable strength, mixed results, adaptable
dignity_effects.enemy_sign: Planet challenged, reduced strength, difficult results, conflicted
dignity_effects.debilitated: Planet weakest, restricted functioning, challenges, need for remedies, growth opportunity
